name: Lalji

services.title: Web Development
services.description: I build modern, responsive websites using React and Node.js, focused on performance, clean UI, and real-world usability. From portfolios to blogs and business sites.

services.title: Automation Systems
services.description: I create automated systems like scheduled content generation, cron jobs, background tasks, and API-based workflows to save time and improve consistency.

services.title: Full-Stack Projects
services.description: I develop full-stack applications with frontend, backend APIs, and databases, including authentication, CRUD features, and scalable project structure.

services.title: Deployment & Hosting
services.description: I deploy websites and backend services on platforms like Vercel and Render, set up environment variables, and ensure projects run smoothly in production.

aboutpara:

As a fresher, I focus on writing clean, maintainable code, understanding how systems work end-to-end, and building projects that are not just visually appealing but also reliable and scalable. Iâ€™m motivated, detail-oriented, and always eager to grow as a developer.
